(unremovable [cursed], quickness [quick], lucky [luck], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], crown [crown])

Item cannot be forged.

The winner of the arena death match may receive this headband. The Champion will have to defend this prize in upcoming death matches until it finally passes along to a new Champion.
